Uses of Class
xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd.options.PubOption

Packages that use PubOption
Package
Description
xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd.options
Contains pub subcommand or global option with feature.
xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd.subcmd
Provides all supported pub subcommands except pub global which do nothing when execute it on JVM.
xyz.rk0cc.willpub.exceptions.cmd
Provides all exception needed for throwing related Exception under xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd.

  • Uses of PubOption in xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd.options

    Subclasses of PubOption in xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd.options
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AbstractedPubOption
    A factory for building PubOption with implemented AbstractedPubOption.buildOption() already.
    final class 
    PubAllOption
    Apply subcommand with --all option that depending on the subcommand's task.
    final class 
    PubColorOption
    Colourizing output for highlighting result of subcommands.
    final class 
    PubDependencyOverridesOption
    Apply option for PubOutdatedSubCommand that should override dependencies included the result.
    final class 
    PubDevDependenciesOption
    Apply option for PubOutdatedSubCommand that should development dependencies included the result.
    final class 
    PubDevOption
    Option for PubAddSubCommand to indicate the dependency will be added as dev dependency instead of regular dependency.
    final class 
    PubDirectoryOption
    Apply targeted project directory instead of location of program's directory.
    class 
    PubDisableAllowedOption<D extends PubDisableAllowedOption<D>>
    An option can be parsed as disable with giving 'no-' prefix before the option name.
    final class 
    PubDryRunOption
    Perform dry run that make the subcommands does not affect any changes in the project.
    final class 
    PubExecutableOption
    An option for pub global (does not exist in OPIUM) to activate Dart executable into PATH.
    final class 
    PubExecutablesOption
    An option for PubDepsSubCommand that to print all available executables into console.
    final class 
    PubForceOption
    An option for PubPublishSubCommand which skip confirmation and ignore all warnings in package when upload to repository.
    final class 
    PubGitPathOption
    An option for PubAddSubCommand that to specify path to package in Git repository.
    final class 
    PubGitRefOption
    An option for PubAddSubCommand that to indicate which reference will be uses to import Git package.
    final class 
    PubGitUrlOption
    Applying Git URL option on PubAddSubCommand.
    final class 
    PubHelpOption
    An global option that just printing usage for subcommands only.
    final class 
    PubHostedUrlOption
    An option for PubAddSubCommand that to override default hosted repository URL.
    final class 
    PubJsonOption
    Export result in JSON format.
    final class 
    PubMajorVersionsOption
    An option for PubUpgradeSubCommand that which marked resolvable in PubOutdatedSubCommand and ignore upper-bound in pubspec.yaml.
    final class 
    PubNoExecutablesOption
    An option for pub global that activating package without putting executable into bin.
    final class 
    PubNullSafetyOption
    An option for PubUpgradeSubCommand which do similar thing in PubMajorVersionsOption but required null safety which marked ? as suffix of the type to indicate this variable accepts null value.
    final class 
    PubOfflineOption
    An option applied for which related with dependencies modification subcommands that skip fetching package from repository online.
    class 
    PubOptionWithValue<V extends PubOptionWithValue<V>>
    A PubOption parsed with given value.
    final class 
    PubPackageOption
    An option for PubUploaderSubCommand that to grant a user who uses the email address to upload name of the package.
    final class 
    PubPathOption
    An option for PubAddSubCommand that to locate package from local machine.
    final class 
    PubPrecompileOption
    An option that precompile executable in immediate dependencies or not.
    final class 
    PubPrereleasesOption
    An option for PubOutdatedSubCommand that does prerelease package determine as last package version.
    final class 
    PubSdkOption
    An option for PubAddSubCommand that to indicate which SDK shipped with the package.
    final class 
    PubStyleOption
    An option for PubDepsSubCommand that to configure how dependencies information shown.
    final class 
    PubTraceOption
    An global option that to print stack trace when error occurs.
    final class 
    PubTransitiveOption
    An option to include transitive dependencies when calling PubOutdatedSubCommand.
    final class 
    PubUpToDateOption
    An option for PubOutdatedSubCommand that including up-to-date packages in output.
    final class 
    PubVerboseOption
    An alias global option of PubVerbosityOption that display all outputs when running subcommands.
    final class 
    PubVerbosityOption
    An global option that to determine level of the information will be displayed.
    final class 
    PubVersionOption
    An option for PubCacheSubCommand that to constraint which version of the package should be cached.
